item.title: Prospecting snippet for delta
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

They do return variable values, here’s the enum…

[code=java] private enum rockData {
COPPER(2090, 436, 1, 17, 1),
TIN(2094, 438, 1, 17, 1 ),
IRON(2092, 440, 15, 35, 2),
SILVER(2100, 442, 20, 40, 3),
COAL(2097, 453, 30, 50, 3),
//GOLD(2096, 444, 40, 65, 7),
MITHRIL(2098, 447, 55, 80, 6),
ADAMANT(2102, 449, 70, 95, 7),
RUNE(2104, 451, 85, 125, 7);

	private int rockId, oreId, level, exp, delay;

	private rockData(int rockId, int oreId, int level, int exp, int delay) {
		this.rockId = rockId; 
		this.oreId = oreId;
		this.level = level;
		this.exp = exp;
		this.delay = delay;
	}
	
	public int getRock() {
		return rockId;
	}
	
	public int getOre() {
		return oreId;
	}
	
	public int getReqLevel() {
		return level;
	}
	
	public int getExp() {
		return exp * Config.xpRate;
	}
	 
	public int thicks() {
		return delay;
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Prospecting snippet for delta
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:1, topic:529925”][code=java] public static void prospect(Client player, int objectId) {
for(rockData e: rockData.values()) {
if(objectId == e.getRock()) {
String ore = player.getItemName(e.getOre());
player.sM("you start prospecting the rock… ");
getProspect(player, ore);
}
}
}

public static void getProspect(final Client player, final String ore) {
	Server.getTaskScheduler().schedule(new Task(2, true) {
		private int count = 5;

		@Override
		protected void execute() {

			if (count > 0) {
				PlayerHandler.messageToAll = count + "...";
				count--;
			} else {
				player.sM("It contains "+ore+" ");
				stop();
			}
		}
	});
}[/code]

You may want to add that piece of code in…
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,648221.0.html[/quote]
You shouldn’t need 2 methods for this. Also, getters usually return variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Prospecting snippet for delta
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[code=java] public static void prospect(Client player, int objectId) {
for(rockData e: rockData.values()) {
if(objectId == e.getRock()) {
String ore = player.getItemName(e.getOre());
player.sM("you start prospecting the rock… ");
getProspect(player, ore);
}
}
}

public static void getProspect(final Client player, final String ore) {
	Server.getTaskScheduler().schedule(new Task(2, true) {
		private int count = 5;

		@Override
		protected void execute() {

			if (count > 0) {
				PlayerHandler.messageToAll = count + "...";
				count--;
			} else {
				player.sM("It contains "+ore+" ");
				stop();
			}
		}
	});
}[/code]

You may want to add that piece of code in…
